beer.beer_description:
During hop harvest this year we were visited in Katoomba by our mates at Kyoto Brewing and together we brewed a collaboration that we knew would stand out from the crowd. 
After a few beers we decided that the only logical thing to do with one of the premier Japanese breweries was to brew a Belgian style IPA, before we all flew off to New Zealand. Is that clear?
This Belgian IPA blends everything we love about traditional Belgian ales with our modern interpretation of West Coast IPA’s whilst also incorporating some New Zealand grown hops that we all sniffed during harvest. 
Pouring out a bright, golden colour thanks to a generous addition of honey malt, our first ever Belgian IPA displays assertive citrus aroma from the double dry hop of Simcoe, Southern Cross and Riwaka hops before ending each sip with a subtle yet complex spiciness from the traditional Belgian ale yeast.

user.bio: I love beer. My aim is to taste and review as many different beer from around the world. 1 beer at a time.

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 390 check-ins at venue that is verified.  Try 5 more for Level 79!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 115 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 24! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 460 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 93! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Do you come from the land down under, where beer does flow, and men chunder? That's at least 195 different beers from Australia. Try 5 more for Level 40.

items.checkin_comment: Unclear amber with a large w head. Aroma of oranges, some grapefruit apricot, spiced dough. The grapefruit is a little more prominent upon a sip. A little bubblegum along w the dough & spices before a finish that's slightly boozy as well as bitter.

items.badge_description:
Hoppy IPA Day!

Did you know that, since our inception in 2010, our hoppy lil’ community has checked in over 400 million IPAs? That’s a seriously staggering amount of hops!⁠

items.badge_description:
Hoppy IPA Day!

Did you know that, since our inception in 2010, our hoppy lil’ community has checked in over 400 million IPAs? That’s a seriously staggering amount of hops!⁠

Ahhh...the great outdoors. Fresh air, blue skies, becoming one with nature. And a beer. Can your day get any better? That’s 5 different venues with the category of Park. Check-in to 5 more to get to Level 2.

items.checkin_comment: Never met disappointing Belgian IPA so far.

items.badge_description:
Hoppy International Beer Day!

Beer serves as the common thread that links us worldwide, possessing the ability to bring people together in a unique way.

Beer has played a significant role in shaping countless of our most cherished memories. And if there’s one thing we’ve learned along the way, beer is best when shared with others.

Celebrate one of the fastest growing sports in the world with this exclusive National Disc Golf Day badge sponsored by the Disc Golf Pro Tour. Disc golf is easy to learn, affordable to play, and accessible to all ages and skill levels. Played much like traditional golf but with flying discs and chain baskets, the game blends precision, strategy, and athleticism with serene natural environments. The best disc golfers in the world play on the Disc Golf Pro Tour. You can watch the Disc Golf Pro Tour for FREE on the JomezPro YouTube channel! WATCH DISC GOLF HIGHLIGHTS

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 5 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 2. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: I climb rocks and race motorbikes, drink beer in between those things.
